backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles with access control and wallet address validation, exposing CRUD-style profile and wallet APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence mapping showing which frontend files implement wallet connection and management functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files including pages, hooks, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions providing light/dark mode color tokens and layout styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up authentication-aware routing, profile setup flow, and global providers for the React app.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying branding, attribution, and social links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with login/logout flow, user menu, and navigation including a Connect Wallet entry.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal-like screen that collects and saves a new user's display name before granting access.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the authenticated/anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity state, login flow, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and wallet addresses via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectWallet.tsx: Wallet management page enabling users to view, link, update, or remove a wallet address with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing hero content, feature cards, and authenticated user info with navigation support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom color tokens, typography and animation extensions, and includes typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
